Room.Name: Myrr Lane
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling on Myrr Lane, west of Magenta Avenue.
Room.LongDescription: There is an empty lot on the north side of the lane, but close to the edge of the street is a watchman's shack. This empty lot is not the normal, overgrown-with-weeds lot you may be used to. This is an EMPTY LOT. There's nothing there but a black hole.
